Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the town of Dickinson to establish hotel and motel taxes within such town
Summary: Authorizes the town of Dickinson to establish hotel and motel taxes within such town.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Dickinson to establish hotel and motel taxes; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
